ValidationRule.description: To move a deal to Approved by Committee stage, the IC Approval Date field must be complete.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND(
(RecordType.Name = "Single Asset Bridge Loan") || (RecordType.Name = "Bridge Loan"),
ISCHANGED( StageName ),
ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Approved by Committee"),
ISBLANK(IC_Approval_Date__c) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: IC Approval Date field must be complete before moving deal to Approved by Committee stage.
